newsitem.title: UK: LME copper spreads lose steam in official ring.
newsitem.headline: LME copper spreads lose steam in official ring.

text.p: COPPER - Spreads deflate as lending swamps ring. Cash/day narrows to $5/$10 backwardation from earlier $16, cash/May to $50 from $110 and cash/threes around $140 from over $200.
ALUMINIUM - Threes/Average 1998 spread flips into backwardation, bid at $11 back from $17/$20 contango on Friday.
OTHERS - Some off highs, but firmer with copper, aluminium.
